text: he eemaan vaalo! apanon ke siva kisee ko apana bhedee na banao[1], ve tumhaara bigaadane mein tanik bhee nahin chookenge, unahen vahee baat bhaatee hai, jisase tumhen duhkh ho. unake mukhon se shatruta khul chukee hai tatha jo unake dil chhupa rahe hain, vo isase badhakar hai. hamane tumhaare lie aayaton ka varnan kar diya hai, yadi tum samajho
